title: Streamline Development Task UI
description: Clean up the Development Task interface by removing extraneous elements including Branch display, PR status indicators, and Rebase functionality to create a focused, distraction-free user experience.
iWant: a streamlined Development Task interface with only essential information
soThat: I can identify and act on task priorities without UI clutter slowing me down
acceptanceCriteria: Branch field is completely removed from Development Task view
PR created and ready for development status text is hidden
Rebase link is eliminated from all task action menus
UI layout adjusts automatically to fill removed element space
